fields.content:
## What?

This event is about the sustainable creation of useful software in a responsible way.

It consists of two days of highly collaborative interactions, including Lightning Talks (on Thursday evening), scheduled sessions (on Friday), and a self-organized Open Space (on Saturday). The event will be much like a retreat. 
We will be there for 48 hours to collaborate and share ideas.

Furthermore, the conference is followed by a [Code Retreat](http://coderetreat.org/) on Sunday August 5th.

Follow [@socrates_2012](http://twitter.com/socrates_2012) on Twitter, to stay up-to-date.

## When?

**August 2-5 2012**

More precisely:  
The SoCraTes conference takes place from the evening of Thursday August 2nd 2012 (about 5pm) through the evening on Saturday August 4th 2012.
The conference is followed by a Code Retreat on Sunday August 5th 2012 (until about 6pm). This is a separate, optional event which is not included in the conference.

HomePageZwei   
SessionIncubator   
CssTest

SessionIncubator   
CssTest

This page is used to generate and collect ideas for sessions to be held at SoCraTes 2012. In addition, participants interested in hosting a session can find support of like-minded people to prepare and facilitate the session together.

## How does it work?

*Adding a session*: If you have a session idea please grab the Wiki source code of the template from below, copy it, and add your session to the list at the bottom.   
*Expressing interest in a session*: If you are interested in a session on the list, please add your name to the list of Interested people of this session. Please also think about how you could contribute and put your contribution in parentheses after your name.



---

## Template

### Session Title

Session Description ...

*Session host:* YOUR NAME HERE   
*Need help?* YES/NO   
*Interested*: ...

---

## Session Ideas

...

HomePageZwei   
SessionIncubator

SoCraTes 2012

2nd International Software Craftsmanship and Testing Conference in Germany

August 2-4 2012, Rückersbach, Code Retreat on August 5

What?

This event is about the sustainable creation of useful software in a responsible way.

There will be two days of

  • highly collaborative interactions
  • lightning talks
  • self-organized Open Space

The event will be much like a retreat. We will be there for 48 hours to collaborate and share ideas.

When?

August 2-4 2012

More precisely:

The SoCraTes conference takes place from the evening of Thursday August 2nd 2012 (about 5pm) through the evening on Saturday August 4th 2012.

The conference is followed by a Code Retreat on Sunday August 5th 2012 (until about 6pm). This is a separate, optional event which is not included in the conference.

Where?

Out in the country, at the lovely Seminarzentrum Rückersbach (German only website), one hour from Frankfurt (Main) airport.

There you will get your room and the event will happen there. We will rent the whole facility, so we can concentrate on what we like to do most.

Venue Address:

Kolpingstraße 1, 63867 Johannesberg

Who should come?

Everyone who is concerned with coding, testing, code quality, software craftsmanship...

  • For you, coding is more than writing text in an editor.
  • For you, testing is more than ensuring quality.
  • For you, testing is more than executing given scenarios.

How?

Run as a non-profit, low-cost, community-organized event. Brought to you as a joint-effort of all Softwerkskammer groups, the community of all German Software Craftsmanship groups.

Facilitation will be in English, sessions in other languages are welcome.

Sponsorship

We would appreciate support by sponsoring the event. If you'd like to support the SoCraTes conference 2012, see our Sponsorship Flyer for our sponsorship package.

Contact

Follow @socrates_2012 on Twitter, to stay up-to-date.

Email: info@socrates-conference.de
